data.name: Hell Architect - Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Discover once again the unique art style and the surreal landscapes of Hell Architect with this Official Artbook.
Take your best chance to see what you can find in Hell!

Over 50 pages of exclusive content:

  • Original sketches and their development
  • Demons
  • Sinners
  • Buildings
  • Promo Art
  • Artists workflow and inspirations

Love for art is a fundamental skill for the perfect Hell Architect!

data.short_description: The Official Artbook of Hell Architect, containing exclusive artworks, sketches, and inspirations.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 / Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
